Platform Icons

On This Page

  • Usage
  • Icons
  • Sizing

Usage

Class

Class
pi-{ icon name }

You get an icon

You can add this class to any empty div. We hijack the deprecated <i> which has become the standard in recent years.

Demo

Markup

<i class="pi-trophy"></i>

Remeber to add the proper aria-label when the icon is a decoration only aria-hidden="true".

Sizing

Class

Class Result
pi-{ xs, sm, lg, xl, xxl }

Alter the size of your icon from .5rem to 3rem.

Demo

Markup

<i class="pi-rocket pi-xs"></i>
<i class="pi-rocket pi-sm"></i>
<i class="pi-rocket"></i>
<i class="pi-rocket pi-lg"></i>
<i class="pi-rocket pi-xl"></i>
<i class="pi-rocket pi-xxl"></i>

On This Page

  • Icons
  • Sizing
Platform UI

Built by the Ritter Insurance Marketing development team, aka RIMdev, to power our platform of staff and agent tools.

Platform UI is available on npm and uses SkellyCSS, also on npm and github

Current version 1.6.3

©2023 Ritter Insurance Marketing
